question: In context with the Conference of Parties (COP) to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD), which among the following markedÂ Rio+20 CBDconference?
explanation: The tenth meeting of the Conference of the Parties (COP 10) on Biological Diversity was organized in Nagoya, Aichi Prefecture, Japan in 2010. It marked the Rio+20 Convention on Biological Diversity.
